entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes:
BasicAuthenticator: added simple refererence implementation of basic HttpAuthenticator.
metadata-handlers.properties - added more handlers to be discovered by default metadata handler
EventSourceInterface SubscriptionManagerInterface -added framework classes for users wanting to leverage Eventing in Wiseman
AnnotationProcessor: -added updated methods to process method bodies included additional metadata -added methods to extract metadata returned via enumerations -added method to locate specific metadata instance via metadataResourceUID -nameContext instance for filtration -method to strip metadata only fields from a Management message.
DefaultAddressingModelAnnotation: -added additional metadata elements to define accepted methods and their model format -made metaDataUID a required field for new annotations -added operation definition annotation
MetadataViewer: -modified the gui to display the new metadata components
Metadata: -added initialize action and action response element
MetadataUtility: -added mechanism to get all exposed metadata information as familiar Management instances -added credential method for utility communication -added registerEventSourceWithSubscriptionManager as place holder for eventing methods -added registerEventSinkWithSubscriber as placeholder for eventing methods.
metadata-payload.xsd metadata.xsd - metadata definition schemas
eventsubman_handler: default subscription manager
metadata_handler: added the skeleton for enumeration of metadata. Still has issues.
eventcreator_handler: simple handler implementation of an event listener
user_handler: annotated the handler
Wiseman-Metadata-DeveloperDocs.doc: modifed to descibe enhancements to metadata

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg: Issue 74: Moved the IdentifyResponse creation functionality out of the WSManAgent into the RequestDispatcher. -Users can override the Map<QName, String> getAdditionalIdentifyElements() elements in their requestDispatcher implementation to provide additional simple XML nodes to the IdentifyRespone

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Issue number: 88 Obtained from: jfdenise Submitted by: denis_rachal Reviewed by:
Algortihm in EventingSupport.pull() changed as follows:
Interaction between EnumerationSupport.pull() & EnumerationIterator.next()
pull() calls next() in a loop:
* next() returns null * if the number of items collected so far is > 0 break the loop and return the collected items * if the number of items collected so far == 0 call iterator.wait(time left) * data asynchronously arrives for addition to the iterator * data is added to iterators queue * thread that adds or detects addition of data to iterators queue calls iterator.notify() * pull() wakes up and restarts loop calling next() * if timeout occurs on wait() timeout fault is returned * next() returns an EnumerationElement & element is added to collection

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:

Message added - method to add name spaces for possible extensions
WSManAgent added - mechanism to expose extension schemas if they exist
XMLBinding: modified mechanism allowing for extensions to the package list for base xml bindings.

metadata-payload.xsd metadata.xsd - metadata definition schemas repositioned within extension directory layout
build.xml: modifed to include extensions processing

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes:
AnnotationProcessor: -added new method that can conditionally trim an arbitrary list of Headers passed from the returned Management instance and conditionally remove Message payload. -added mechanism to get all exposed metadata from a metadata repository
MetadataUtility: -more eventing testing/modifications
MetadataTest: -modified test to use newer metadata pruning method. -added method to more thoroughly exercise the metadata payload description.
ResourceFactory: -added bindings elements
ResourceTest: -added method to exercise the eventsource
se/build.xml: -included metadata_handler in jars -added build steps for autoextractable metadataViewer -modified test path to include tools jar as well.
DeveloperDocs: -added numerous .jpgs for diagrams included in the developer docs -added numerous .png for diagrams included in the developer docs -adding draft of MetadataFlavored-Resources.doc describing how to use metadata in Wiseman -adding draft of Wiseman-Client-Framework.doc describing how the client framework can be used. -fixed a few bugs in the Wiseman-MetaData-DeveloperDocs.doc file.

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Issue number: 103 Obtained from: Submitted by: Simeon Pinder Reviewed by:
Mechanism to obtain WSDLs and Schemas using HTTP Get enhanced to also accept syntax used by Axis & Microsoft WCF. That method uses a query string in the URL, e.g.
http://localhost:8080/wsman?wsdl http://localhost:8080/wsman?wsdl=light.wsdl
or
http://localhost:8080/wsman?xsd http://localhost:8080/wsman?xsd=light.xsd
This is in addition to the current mechanism described by the subitter of this enhancement request.

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg: changes: -set 1.0 release implementation version -enable metadata ResourceURIs from extracted EPR -useful eventing constants and fix for notifyTo in utility. -cleaned up EventSourceInterface,SubscriptionManagerInterface definitions -added MetadataResourceAccessor draft -improved mechanism to strip unwanted headers from metadata decorated Management mesgs -added unregister mechanism to facilitate remote SubscriptionManager implementations

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes:
BasicAuthenticator: added simple refererence implementation of basic HttpAuthenticator.
metadata-handlers.properties - added more handlers to be discovered by default metadata handler
EventSourceInterface SubscriptionManagerInterface -added framework classes for users wanting to leverage Eventing in Wiseman
AnnotationProcessor: -added updated methods to process method bodies included additional metadata -added methods to extract metadata returned via enumerations -added method to locate specific metadata instance via metadataResourceUID -nameContext instance for filtration -method to strip metadata only fields from a Management message.
DefaultAddressingModelAnnotation: -added additional metadata elements to define accepted methods and their model format -made metaDataUID a required field for new annotations -added operation definition annotation
MetadataViewer: -modified the gui to display the new metadata components
Metadata: -added initialize action and action response element
MetadataUtility: -added mechanism to get all exposed metadata information as familiar Management instances -added credential method for utility communication -added registerEventSourceWithSubscriptionManager as place holder for eventing methods -added registerEventSinkWithSubscriber as placeholder for eventing methods.
metadata-payload.xsd metadata.xsd - metadata definition schemas
eventsubman_handler: default subscription manager
metadata_handler: added the skeleton for enumeration of metadata. Still has issues.
eventcreator_handler: simple handler implementation of an event listener
user_handler: annotated the handler
Wiseman-Metadata-DeveloperDocs.doc: modifed to descibe enhancements to metadata

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Issue number: 103 Obtained from: Submitted by: Simeon Pinder Reviewed by:
Mechanism to obtain WSDLs and Schemas using HTTP Get enhanced to also accept syntax used by Axis & Microsoft WCF. That method uses a query string in the URL, e.g.
http://localhost:8080/wsman?wsdl http://localhost:8080/wsman?wsdl=light.wsdl
or
http://localhost:8080/wsman?xsd http://localhost:8080/wsman?xsd=light.xsd
This is in addition to the current mechanism described by the subitter of this enhancement request.

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes-->
ManagementUtility: -added selectorSet creator method -added org.w3c.dom.Node to String convenience method.
EventingSupport: -added default expiration fileds/accessors
HttpClient: -elminated some duplicate logging logic -added commented out template for how to include HttpCommons' HttpClient to seamlessly handle http transport
TransferSupport: -added mechanism to include body in Management payload
eventsubman_Handler: -fixed problem with static initialization -pulled create actions into own method.
eventcreator:
MetadataTest: -modified test to use newer metadata pruning method. -added method to more thoroughly exercise the metadata payload description.

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes:
BasicAuthenticator: added simple refererence implementation of basic HttpAuthenticator.
metadata-handlers.properties - added more handlers to be discovered by default metadata handler
EventSourceInterface SubscriptionManagerInterface -added framework classes for users wanting to leverage Eventing in Wiseman
AnnotationProcessor: -added updated methods to process method bodies included additional metadata -added methods to extract metadata returned via enumerations -added method to locate specific metadata instance via metadataResourceUID -nameContext instance for filtration -method to strip metadata only fields from a Management message.
DefaultAddressingModelAnnotation: -added additional metadata elements to define accepted methods and their model format -made metaDataUID a required field for new annotations -added operation definition annotation
MetadataViewer: -modified the gui to display the new metadata components
Metadata: -added initialize action and action response element
MetadataUtility: -added mechanism to get all exposed metadata information as familiar Management instances -added credential method for utility communication -added registerEventSourceWithSubscriptionManager as place holder for eventing methods -added registerEventSinkWithSubscriber as placeholder for eventing methods.
metadata-payload.xsd metadata.xsd - metadata definition schemas
eventsubman_handler: default subscription manager
metadata_handler: added the skeleton for enumeration of metadata. Still has issues.
eventcreator_handler: simple handler implementation of an event listener
user_handler: annotated the handler
Wiseman-Metadata-DeveloperDocs.doc: modifed to descibe enhancements to metadata

entry.author: simeonpinder
entry.msg:
Numerous changes:
AnnotationProcessor: -added new method that can conditionally trim an arbitrary list of Headers passed from the returned Management instance and conditionally remove Message payload. -added mechanism to get all exposed metadata from a metadata repository
MetadataUtility: -more eventing testing/modifications
MetadataTest: -modified test to use newer metadata pruning method. -added method to more thoroughly exercise the metadata payload description.
ResourceFactory: -added bindings elements
ResourceTest: -added method to exercise the eventsource
se/build.xml: -included metadata_handler in jars -added build steps for autoextractable metadataViewer -modified test path to include tools jar as well.
DeveloperDocs: -added numerous .jpgs for diagrams included in the developer docs -added numerous .png for diagrams included in the developer docs -adding draft of MetadataFlavored-Resources.doc describing how to use metadata in Wiseman -adding draft of Wiseman-Client-Framework.doc describing how the client framework can be used. -fixed a few bugs in the Wiseman-MetaData-DeveloperDocs.doc file.

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Removed fork="yes" on javac tasks. It causes compiler errors on Windows systems with spaces in the pathname. Error resported in compile is:
[javac] C:/Documents and Settings/All Users/workspace/wiseman/se/gen-src/net/java/dev/wiseman/schemas/metadata/messagetypes/package-info.java:8: package annotations should be in file package-info.java [javac] @javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlSchema(namespace = "http://schemas.wiseman.dev.java.net/metadata/messagetypes", elementFormDefault = javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlNsForm.QUALIFIED) ...

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Issue number: 28 7 32 Obtained from: Submitted by: stephane_sabiani Reviewed by:
EnumerableResouce enhanced to handle exposing filter dialect, as well as end of sequence. EnumerableResource should be used instead of the internal class EnumerationResourceImpl. ResourceFactory also enhanced to allow users access to the needed functionality in EnumerationResourceImpl.

entry.author: denis_rachal
entry.msg:
Issue number: 28 7 32 Obtained from: Submitted by: stephane_sabiani Reviewed by:
EnumerableResouce enhanced to handle exposing filter dialect, as well as end of sequence. EnumerableResource should be used instead of the internal class EnumerationResourceImpl. ResourceFactory also enhanced to allow users access to the needed functionality in EnumerationResourceImpl.
